sentence: Through Dec. 31, America Strong and Free PAC reported raising $119,877 in contributions and expenses and spending $39,763.52, including $15,000 in contributions -- $5,000 apiece to U.S. John Boozman of Arkansas and congressional candidates Juan Ciscomani of Arizona and Matt Jacobs of California.
